titleStmt.title: The Third abstract of the state of the mines of Bwlchyr Eskir-hir in the county of Cardigan from the thirtieth day of April last (inclusive) to this present day of December 1700 / by order of the committee.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Collins in the Old Baily,

notesStmt.note: A report on the mines formerly owned by Carbery Pryse exploited by Sir Humphrey Mackworth in the mine-adventure.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
